response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, I believe its true value surpasses $10,000. Considering the investment we've made into its development and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a purchase price of $15,000. I trust this reflects its true worth and provides an opportunity for us to collaborate on this exceptional piece. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this masterpiece into your possession soon.", "product_price": 15000}
